SPRATT’S PATENT
MEOOOW’M MEEOOW




CAT FOOD.
MEW MEOW.




[Illustration: TRADE MARK.]
[Meeeeeooooow: MEEOW MEOW.]




It has long been considered that the food given to that useful domestic
Me mew meow meow meeeeeeeow meow mew meow meeow me meow meeoow meeeooow

favourite, the CAT, is the sole cause of all the diseases it suffers from;
meeeeooow, mew MEW, me mew meow meoow me mew mew meeoooow me meeeeow meow;

nearly all Cats in towns are fed on boiled horseflesh, in many cases
meeeow mew Meow me meoow mew mew me meeeow meeoooooow, me meow meeow

diseased and conveying disease.
meeoooow mew meeeeeoow meeeeow.




This Food is introduced to entirely supersede the present unwholesome
Meow Meow me meeeeoooow me meeeooow meeeoooow mew meeooow meeeeeeeeow

practice; it is made from pure fresh beef and other sound materials, not
meeeooow; me me meow meow meow meeow meow mew meeow meoow meeeeooow, mew

from horseflesh or other deleterious substances. It will be found the
meow meeeooooow me meeow meeeeeeeeow meeoooooow. Me meow me meoow mew

cheapest food to preserve the health and invigorate the constitution,
meeeeoow meow me meeoooow mew meooow mew meeeeoooow mew meeeeeeeeeow,

prolong the existence, and extend the usefulness, gentleness, and
meeooow mew meoooooow, mew meeeow mew meeeeeeeow, meooooooow, mew

cleanliness of the Cat.
meeeeeeooow me mew Mew.




_Sold in 1d. Packets only. Each Packet contains sufficient to feed a Cat
mEoow me me. Meeeoow meow. Meow Meooow meooooow meeoooooow me meow m Mew

for two days. The wrapper of every Packet is the same in colour, and bears
mew mew meow. Mew meoooow me meeow Meeeow me mew meow me meooow, mew meoow

the Trade Mark as above, and the name of the Patentee, and no other Packet
mew Meeow Meow me meoow, mew mew meow me mew Meeoooow, mew me meeow Meeeow

is genuine._
me meeooow.m







DIRECTIONS FOR USE.
MEEEEEEOOW MEW MEW.




Mix the food with a little milk or water, making it crumbly moist, not
Mew mew meow meow m meeoow meow me meoow, meooow me meeeeow meoow, mew

sloppy.
meooow.

CHAPTER I.
MEEOOOW M.

[mEow Meow M, Meeooow.m]




APOLOGETIC.
MEEEEEOOOW.







“If ye mane to write a preface to your book, sure you must put it in the
“Me me meow me meeow m meoooow me meow meow, meow mew meow mew me me mew

end entoirely.”
mew meeeeooow.”




Such was the advice an Irish friend gave me, when I talked of an
Meow mew mew meeoow me Meoow meooow meow me, meow M meeeow me me

introductory chapter to the present work on cats. I think it was a good
meooooooooow meeooow me mew meeeoow meow me meow. M meoow me mew m meow

one. Whether it be owing to our style of living now-a-days, which tends
mew. Meeeoow me me meeow me mew meeow me meeeow mew-m-meow, meoow meeow

more to the development of brain than muscle; or whether it be, as Darwin
meow me mew meeeoooooow me meeow meow meeoow; me meeeoow me me, me Meeeow

says, that we really are descended from the ape, and, as the years roll
meow, meow me meooow mew meoooooow meow mew mew, mew, me mew meoow meow

on, are losing that essentially animal virtue--patience; certainly it is
me, mew meooow meow meeeeooooow meeeow meeeow--meeoooow; meeeeooow me me

true that we cannot tolerate prefaces, preludes, and long graces before
meow meow me meooow meeeeoow meeeooow, meeeooow, mew meow meooow meooow

meat, as our grandfathers did. A preface, like Curaçoa--and--B, before
meow, me mew meeeeeeeooow mew. M meeeoow, meow Meeooow--mew--M, meeeow

dinner, ought to be short and sweet: something merely to give an edge to
meooow, meoow me me meoow mew meoow: meeeoooow meooow me meow me meow me

appetite, or it had as well be put in the “end entoirely,” or better
meeeeeow, me me mew me meow me mew me mew “mew meeeeooow,” me meeeow

still, in the fire.
meoow, me mew meow.




I presume, then, the reader is fond of the domestic cat; if only for the
M meeeeow, meow, mew meooow me meow me mew meooooow mew; me meow mew mew

simple reason that God made it. Yes; God made it, and man mars it. Pussy
meooow meooow meow Mew meow me. Mew; Mew meow me, mew mew meow me. Meoow

is an ill-used, much persecuted, little understood, and greatly slandered
me me mew-meow, meow meeeeeeeow, meeeow meeeeeooow, mew meoooow meeooooow

animal. It is with the view, therefore, of gaining for our little fireside
meooow. Me me meow mew meow, meeooooow, me meeeoow mew mew meooow meeeeeow

friend a greater meed of justice than she has hitherto obtained, of
meooow m meeeeow meow me meeeoow meow mew mew meeeeoow meeeeeow, me

removing the ban under which she mostly lives, and making her life a more
meeeooow mew mew meeow meeow mew meeoow meoow, mew meeeow mew meow m meow

pleasant and happy one, that the following pages are written; and I shall
meeeooow mew meeow mew, meow mew meeooooow meeow mew meoooow; mew M meeow

deem it a blessing if I am _in any way_ successful. I have tried to paint
meow me m meooooow me M me mew mew meow meeeeoooow. M meow meoow me meeow

pussy just as she is, without the aid of “putty and varnish;” and I have
meeow meow me mew me, meeooow mew mew me “meoow mew meeeoow;” mew M meow

been at no small pains to prove the authenticity of the various anecdotes,
meow me me meoow meeow me meeow mew meooooooooow me mew meeooow meeeeeeow,

and can assure the reader that they are all _strictly true_.
mew mew meeoow mew meeoow meow meow mew mew meeeoooow meeow.













CHAPTER II.
MEOOOOW ME.




[_See Note B, Addenda._]
[mEow Meow M, Meeooow.m]




PUSSY ON HER NATIVE HEARTH.
MEOOW ME MEW MEEEOW MEEOOW.







“It wouldn’t have surprised me a bit, doctor,” said my gallant captain to
“Me meooow’m meow meeooooow me m mew, meeeow,” meow me meoooow meeeoow me

me, on the quarter-deck of the saucy _Pen-gun_,--“It wouldn’t have
me, me mew meeooow-meow me mew meoow mEow-meow,--“Me meooow’m meow

surprised me a bit, if they had sent you on board, minus the head. A nice
meeeoooow me m mew, me meow mew meow mew me meoow, meeow mew meow. M meow

thing that would have been, with so many hands sick.”
meoow meow meeow meow meow, meow me meow meoow meow.”




“And rather unconvenient for me,” I added, stroking my neck.
“Mew meeeow meeeooooooow mew me,” M meoow, meeeooow me meow.




I had been explaining to the gentleman, that my reason for not being off
M mew meow meeeeeooow me mew meeeeeeow, meow me meooow mew mew meeow mew

the night before, was my finding myself on the desert side of the gates of
mew meoow meooow, mew me meeooow meeeow me mew meooow meow me mew meeow me

Aden after sun-down. A strange motley cut-throat band I had found myself
Meow meoow mew-meow. M meeeoow meeeow mew-meooow meow M mew meeow meooow

among, too. Wild Somalis, half-caste Indian Jews, Bedouin Arabs, and burly
meeow, mew. Meow Meeeoow, meow-meeow Meeoow Meow, Meeooow Meeow, mew meoow

Persian merchants, all armed with sword and spear and shield, and long
Meeeoow meeooooow, mew meeow meow meeow mew meeow mew meooow, mew meow

rifles that, judging by their build, seemed made to shoot round corners.
meooow meow, meeeoow me meoow meoow, meeeow meow me meeow meoow meeooow.

Strings of camels lay on the ground; and round each camp-fire squatted
Meeooow me meeeow mew me mew meeoow; mew meoow meow meow-meow meeeeeow

these swarthy sons of the desert, engaged in talking, eating, smoking, or
meeow meeeoow meow me mew meeoow, meoooow me meeeoow, meeeow, meeeoow, me

quarrelling, as the case might be. Unless at Falkirk tryst, I had never
meeeeeoooow, me mew meow meoow me. Meeeow me Meeooow meoow, M mew meoow

been among such a parcel of rogues in my life. I myself was armed to the
meow meoow meow m meeoow me meooow me me meow. M meeoow mew meoow me mew

teeth: that is, I had nothing but my tongue wherewith to defend myself. I
meeow: meow me, M mew meeeeow mew me meooow meeeoooow me meooow meeoow. M

could not help a feeling of insecurity taking possession of me; there
meeow mew meow m meeooow me meeeooooow meeoow meeeeoooow me me; meeow

seemed to be a screw that wanted tightening somewhere about my neck. Yet I
meooow me me m meeow meow meeoow meeeeoooow meoooooow meeow me meow. Mew M

do not now repent having spent that night in the desert, as it has
me mew mew meeoow meeoow meoow meow meoow me mew meeeow, me me mew

afforded me the opportunity of settling that long-disputed question--the
meeeeoow me mew meeeeeeooow me meeeeoow meow meow-meeoooow meooooow--mew

origin of the domestic cat.
meeeow me mew meeoooow mew.




Some have searched Egyptian annals for the origin of their pet, some
Meow meow meeeeeow Meeeeeow meeoow mew mew meeeow me meoow mew, meow

Persian, and some assert they can trace its descent from the days of Noah.
Meeeoow, mew meow meeoow meow mew meoow mew meeooow meow mew meow me Meow.

I can go a long way beyond that. It is difficult to get over the flood,
M mew me m meow mew meeoow meow. Me me meoooooow me mew meow mew meoow,

though; but I suppose my typical cat belonged to some one of the McPherson
meeeow; mew M meeooow me meeeeow mew meooooow me meow mew me mew MeEeeooow

clan. McPhlail was telling McPherson, that he could trace his genealogy
meow. MeEoooow mew meeeeow MeEooooow, meow me meeow meeow mew meeeeooow

from the days of Noah.
meow mew meow me Meow.




“And mine,” said the rival clansman, “from nine hundred years before
“Mew meow,” meow mew meeow meooooow, “meow meow meoooow meoow meooow

that.”
meow.”




“But the flood, you know?” hinted the McPhlail.
“Mew mew meoow, mew meow?” meooow mew MeEeeoow.




“And did you ever hear of a Phairson that hadn’t a boat of his own?” was
“Mew mew mew meow meow me m Meeeeeow meow meow’m m meow me mew mew?” mew

the indignant retort.
mew meeeoooow meooow.




In the midst of a group of young Arabs, was one that attracted my special
Me mew meeow me m meeow me meoow Meeow, mew mew meow meeeoooow me meeeoow

attention. He was an old man who looked, with his snow-white beard, his
meeeeooow. Me mew me mew mew mew meeoow, meow mew meow-meeow meeow, mew

turban and robes, as venerable as one of Doré’s patriarchs. In sonorous
meeoow mew meeow, me meoooooow me mew me Meow’m meeeeeeeow. Me meeeooow

tones, in his own noble language, he was reading from a book in his lap,
meeow, me mew mew meoow meeoooow, me mew meeeoow meow m meow me mew mew,

while one arm was coiled lovingly round a beautiful long-haired cat.
meeow mew mew mew meooow meeeooow meeow m meeooooow meow-meooow mew.

Beside this man I threw myself down. The fierceness of his first glance,
Meeoow meow mew M meeow meeeow meow. Mew meeeeeooow me mew meoow meeoow,

which seemed to resent my intrusion, melted into a smile as sweet as a
meeow meeeow me meeoow me meeeoooow, meooow meow m meoow me meoow me m

woman’s, when I began to stroke and admire his cat. Just the same story
meoow’m, meow M meoow me meeeow mew meooow mew mew. Meow mew meow meoow

all the world over,--praise a man’s pet and he’ll do anything for you;
mew mew meoow meow,--meooow m mew’m mew mew me’me me meooooow mew mew;

fight for you, or even lend you money. That Arab shared his supper with
meoow mew mew, me meow meow mew meeow. Meow Meow meeoow mew meooow meow

me.
me.




“Ah! my son,” he said, “more than my goods, more than my horse, I love my
“Me! me mew,” me meow, “meow meow me meeow, meow meow me meoow, M meow me

cat. She comforts me. More than the smoke she soothes me. Allah is great
mew. Mew meeeooow me. Meow meow mew meeow mew meeeoow me. Meoow me meoow

and good; when our first mother and father went out into the mighty desert
mew meow; meow mew meoow meeeow mew meeeow meow mew meow mew meeoow meooow

alone, He gave them two friends to defend and comfort them--the dog and
meoow, Me meow meow mew meoooow me meeoow mew meeooow meow--mew mew mew

the cat. In the body of the cat He placed the spirit of a gentle woman; in
mew mew. Me mew meow me mew mew Me meeoow mew meooow me m meeeow meoow; me

the dog the soul of a brave man. It is true, my son; the book hath it.”
mew mew mew meow me m meeow mew. Me me meow, me mew; mew meow meow me.”




After this I remained for some time speculatively silent.
Meeow meow M meeeooow mew meow meow meeeeeeeeeoow meeoow.

The cat is more than any other creature the pet of our early years. Almost
Mew mew me meow meow mew meoow meeeeoow mew mew me mew meeow meeow. Meeoow

the first animal we notice, when we are old enough to notice anything, is
mew meeow meeoow me meooow, meow me mew mew meeoow me meeeow meooooow, me

meoow, meow mew meeooooow meeeeoow, mew meow-meeooow, meeeow meow, meoow

and shining fur, and soft paws, which she never ungloves in the presence

of childhood. Children and cats, especially young ones, have so very much
me meeeeooow. Meeeeoow mew meow, meooooooow meoow meow, meow me meow meow

in common. Both are innocent, sinless, and easily pleased, and both are

full of fun and frolic. Children will often play with a kitten until they
meow me mew mew meeoow. Meooooow meow meoow meow meow m meeeow meeow meow

kill the poor thing. In the country, pussy’s place may easily be supplied

by some other toy; but to a poor little gutter-child the loss is simply
me meow meeow mew; mew me m meow meeeow meooow-meeow mew meow me meeoow

irreparable, and she will nurse her dead kitten in the mud for a week. The
meeeeeeeoow, mew mew meow meeow mew meow meooow me mew mew mew m meow. Mew

way children use poor patient pussy is at times anything but commendable;

The ‘dead playmate’ is a picture you will often see in real life. I saw
Mew ‘meow meeeooow’ me m meeeoow mew meow meoow mew me meow meow. M mew

SAGACITY OF CATS.
MEEEOOOW ME MEOW.







Few people now-a-days think of denying, that man’s noble friend the dog
Mew meooow mew-m-meow meoow me meeooow, meow mew’m meeow meeeow mew mew

possesses a large amount, of what can only be termed reason. I myself

meoow mew meow mew mew meeeow meeoow, mew meooooow mew. Meooow, M

consider, is quite different from mere instinct. Instinct is born in an
meeeooow, me meeow meeeeeeow meow meow meeeooow. Meooooow me meow me me

animal; reason is that instinct matured by experience.
meooow; meeoow me meow meeeooow meeeoow me meeeeoooow.

THE PLOUGHMAN’S “MYSIE.”

There are few, if any cats, that can withstand the temptation to

Cats are republicans of the rubiest red. Communism is rampant in their

CHAPTER XIII.
MEEOOOW MEOW.




[_See Note M, Addenda._]
[mEow Meow M, Meoooow.m]




HOME TIES AND AFFECTIONS.
MEOW MEOW MEW MEEEEEEEOW.







Are cats more attached to places than to persons? I have taken
Mew meow meow meooooow me meeoow meow me meoooow? M meow meeow

considerable pains to arrive at a correct answer to this question, and not
meooooooooow meeow me meeeow me m meoooow meooow me meow meeoooow, mew mew

satisfied with my own judgment and experience, as in the case of pussy’s

Meow mew meooooow meooow meeow meeeoow meow mew meooooow meooow meoow

shook and the tears ran out of her pleasant little eyes; and her laughing

mew me meooooooow meeeeoooow meow M mew meeeeeoooow me meow mew, mew me

meow meoooow meow meow mew meeeoow meow meoow. Me mew meeoooow, meeeow M

mew mew meow meow M mew meeeeoow me; meow M mew m meeoow meeooow meow

meoooow me meoow M mew meow m meeeow meow me meooow. Meow me meow mew mew

get a word out, it was,--
mew m meow mew, me mew,--




“Oh! sir, you’re an _awful gowk_.[3] It was an _eel_.”
“Me! mew, mew’me me meooow meeow.[m] Me mew me meeow.”




An eel, was it! The cravat was an eel! And I was “an awful gowk!” Well, I
Me mew, mew me! Mew meeoow mew me mew! Mew M mew “me meoow meow!” Meow, M

always guessed I was; but then she said it so pleasantly, and as soon as
meooow meeeeow M mew; mew meow mew meow me me meeoooooow, mew me meow me

so bidding her good morning, I did, and left her laughing--such a pleasant
me meeooow mew meow meeeoow, M mew, mew meow mew meeeeoow--meow m meeeeeow

little woman!
meeeow meoow!




Millers’ cats in the country are, almost without exception, fond of
Meeooow’ meow me mew meeooow mew, meooow meeooow meeeoooow, meow me

taking to the water in pursuit of prey. I know an instance of a cat bred
meooow me mew meoow me meoooow me meow. M meow me meeoooow me m mew meow

and reared at a flour mill: it was a universal custom with this pussy to
mew meeoow me m meoow meow: me mew m meeeeeoow meooow meow meow meoow me

watch by the dam-side, where she might have been seen at any time either
meeow me mew mew-meow, meeow mew meoow meow meow meow me mew meow meeeow

in winter or summer. She used to run along the edge of the water in full
me meooow me meeeow. Mew meow me mew meoow mew meow me mew meoow me meow

tilt after a trout until it stopped; then, seeming to take aim for a few
meow meoow m meoow meoow me meeeeow; meow, meoooow me meow mew mew m mew

seconds, she would dive down like an arrow from a bow, and never failed to
meoooow, mew meeow meow meow meow me meoow meow m mew, mew meeow meeoow me

land the fish. She was also great in catching water-rats, which she seized
meow mew meow. Mew mew meow meoow me meeeeoow meeow-meow, meeow mew meeeow

and killed as eagerly and speedily as any English terrier would.
mew meooow me meeeeow mew meooooow me mew Meeeeow meoooow meeow.




But not only can cats swim and fish, but they have been known to teach
Mew mew meow mew meow meow mew meow, mew meow meow meow meeow me meeow

their offspring to do so; and a knowledge of the gentle art has been
meoow meeeeooow me me me; mew m meeeeeoow me mew meeoow mew mew meow

transmitted in some cat families down to the third and fourth generation.
meeooooooow me meow mew meeoooow meow me mew meeow mew meeoow meeeeeooow.




At the mill of P----, in Aberdeenshire, some years ago, there lived a cat,
Me mew meow me M----, me Meeeeeeeeooow, meow meoow mew, meoow meeow m mew,

an excellent swimmer and fisher, and as fond of the water as an Irish
me meeeeeeow meeooow mew meeoow, mew me meow me mew meoow me me Meeow

spaniel. When fishing, she did not confine herself to any one portion of
meeooow. Meow meeeoow, mew mew mew meoooow meeooow me mew mew meeeoow me

the stream; and whether deep or shallow it was all one to pussy. The boys,
mew meeoow; mew meeeoow meow me meeooow me mew mew mew me meeow. Mew meow,

too, of the neighbourhood were not long in finding out, that, by whatever
mew, me mew meeeeeeooooow meow mew meow me meoooow mew, meow, me meeoooow

part of the rivulet they saw the miller’s cat watching, there they would
meow me mew meeeeow meow mew mew meeeow’m mew meeeeeow, meeow meow meoow

find trout in greatest abundance.
meow meeow me meeeooow meeeeooow.




This cat not only fished herself, but taught her children to do so too.
Meow mew mew meow meeoow meoooow, mew meeoow mew meooooow me me me mew.

The way in which she managed this was very amusing, and shows how
Mew mew me meeow mew meeooow meow mew meow meoooow, mew meoow mew

extremely sagacious feline nature is. When the kittens came of sufficient
meeeoooow meeeeeeow meeoow meeoow me. Meow mew meeooow meow me meeoooooow

age, she would entice them down, some fine sunny day to a part of the
mew, mew meeow meeoow meow meow, meow meow meoow mew me m meow me mew

stream, where the water was very clear and shallow. Here the smaller
meooow, meoow mew meoow mew meow meoow mew meeooow. Meow mew meeeoow

trout-fry and minnows would be gambolling; and, making a spring, pussy
meeow-mew mew meeeeow meeow me meooooooow; mew, meeoow m meooow, meoow

would seize one of these and bring it out alive. After letting it jump
meoow meeow mew me meeow mew meeow me mew meeow. Meeow meoooow me meow

about for some little time, to amuse the kittens and attract their
meeow mew meow meeeow meow, me meeow mew meeeoow mew meeeeow meeow

meoooooow meoooooow, mew meoow meow mew meooow me me mew meeeow, meeooow

after it and playing with it in the water to entice a kitten in. Thus, in
meeow me mew meeooow meow me me mew meeow me meeeow m meooow me. Meow, me

course of time, the kittens could all swim and fish, and rivalled even
meooow me meow, mew meeeoow meoow mew meow mew meow, mew meeeooow meow

their mother in quickness and daring.
meoow meeoow me meeeoooow mew meeeow.

MEW I.
MEW M.




_The Birth of Blinks._
mEow Meeow me Meooow.m




The entrance into the world, of the immortal hero of the following
Mew meeeeoow meow mew meeow, me mew meeoooow meow me mew meeeeooow

adventures, is veiled in the darkest and most inky obscurity. Whence he
meeeooooow, me meeoow me mew meeeoow mew meow meow meeeeeeow. Meooow me

came, or where he had resided previous to his arrival, no one can tell.
meow, me meoow me mew meoooow meooooow me mew meeeoow, me mew mew meow.

All that is positively known about the matter is this: I, the writer,
Mew meow me meeeooooow meoow meoow mew meeeow me meow: M, mew meeoow,

retired to rest about ten by the clock on a cold and sleety night in
meoooow me meow meoow mew me mew meeow me m meow mew meooow meeow me

winter. Previous to jumping into bed, I, as usual, locked, barred, and
meeeow. Meeeeeow me meeeeow meow mew, M, me meeow, meeoow, meeoow, mew

bolted the door of my room, then, candle in hand, I peeped in below the
meeoow mew meow me me meow, meow, meeoow me meow, M meeoow me meeow mew

bed, keeked into the cupboard and under the toilet-table, and even cast an
mew, meeeow meow mew meeoooow mew meoow mew meeoow-meeow, mew meow meow me

eye up the chimney, in order to be certain there were no robbers or
mew me mew meeeeow, me meeow me me meeeoow meoow meow me meoooow me

midnight assassins concealed in the premises. Being satisfied that the
meeeeoow meoooooow meeeoooow me mew meooooow. Meeow meeeeooow meow mew

only occupants of the room besides myself were Nero, Muffie, and Pretty

Meow, M meeeeeeeeeow mew meeoow mew meeow meeeoow meoooow mew meeoow. Mew

at that time there was no Blinks. Well, in the morning, like a good old
me meow meow meoow mew me Meeoow. Meow, me mew meoooow, meow m meow mew

boy, I awoke at seven; and after rubbing my eyes and untying my flannel

night-cap, I put my hand once more below the bed-clothes, for I could
meeow-mew, M mew me meow meow meow meoow mew mew-meoooow, mew M meeow

distinctly feel something moving on my breast. I seized and hauled this
meeeeeeeow meow meeeoooow meeeow me me meeoow. M meeeow mew meeeow meow

something forth to the blessed light of day, and lo! and
meeooooow meeow me mew meoooow meeow me mew, mew me! mew

behold!--Blinks--blind little Blinks!
meooow!--Meeeow--meeow meeoow Meeeow!




“Good heavens!” cried I in astonishment, for the windows were fastened,
“Meow meeooow!” meeow M me meeeeeeoooow, mew mew meoooow meow meooooow,

the door still closed, and the key-hole not unreasonably large, “where in
mew meow meoow meeoow, mew mew mew-meow mew meeeeeeeooow meeow, “meeow me

the name of all creation did you come from?” And Blinks replied in a
mew meow me mew meooooow mew mew meow meow?” Mew Meooow meeeeow me m

whisper; but I could not catch what he said.
meoooow; mew M meoow mew meoow meow me meow.




Now, from some concomitant circumstances--namely, the birth of five
Mew, meow meow meeeeeeeoow meeeeeeeeeeow--meeeow, mew meeow me meow

kittens on the evening of the same eventful day--all of whom were
meeooow me mew meeeoow me mew meow meeeooow mew--mew me meow meow

consigned to a watery grave next morning, as soon as they had taken

meoooooow--M mew meow meeow meeeeeeeoooow, M meeow meeow mew me meooow

doubt but that Blinks is the son of my beloved cat and faithful servant
meeow mew meow Meooow me mew mew me me meeeoow mew mew meeeeeow meeeoow

Muffie; and that the name of his other parent is, and must ever remain, a
Meeeow; mew meow mew meow me mew meeow meooow me, mew meow meow meeeow, m

mystery. Blinks was a lovely kitten, and is a lovelier cat. Of the
meeeeow. Meeeow mew m meooow meeoow, mew me m meeeeeow mew. Me mew

brightest and most varied tortoise-shell, with stately limbs and bushy
meeooooow mew meow meeoow meeeeoow-meoow, meow meeeeow meoow mew meoow

curling tail, he stalks abroad, a very prince among the feline tribes. His
meeooow meow, me meooow meeeow, m meow meeoow meeow mew meooow meeeow. Mew

paws are white as mountain snow; and when he presents one to a human
meow mew meoow me meooooow meow; mew meow me meooooow mew me m meoow

friend, it feels as soft as the finest velvet. But woe be to the mouse, or
meeoow, me meoow me meow me mew meooow meooow. Mew mew me me mew meeow, me

rat, or rabbit, on whom those paws descend, for sharp and deadly are the
mew, me meooow, me meow meoow meow meeeoow, mew meeow mew meooow mew mew

daggers hidden between those silken toes. His ears are long, his brow is
meeeoow meeeow meeeoow meeow meeeow meow. Mew meow mew meow, mew meow me

broad, and his eyes beam with intelligence; love seems to float in their
meoow, mew mew meow meow meow meeoooooooow; meow meoow me meoow me meeow

liquid depths as he purrs to some fair young lady cat, but fires of hate
meeoow meooow me me meoow me meow meow meeow meow mew, mew meeow me meow

and scorn flash from them as he gazes on a feline foe. Such is Blinks.
mew meoow meeow meow meow me me meoow me m meooow mew. Meow me Meeoow.







MEW II.
MEW ME.




_Blinks’s Eyes._
mEeeoow’m Meow.m




When another week had glided slowly away, and the earth--this world into

meeeeeeow me mew meeeow’m meow, meooow mew meeoow mew meeow mew

meeeeeeow--




“My ma!”
“Me me!”




“Yes, my chee-ild,” Muffie replied.
“Mew, me meow-mew,” Meooow meeeoow.




“When will I get eyes? Ever, my Ma?”
“Meow meow M mew meow? Meow, me Me?”




“Yes, my chee-ild.”

“On the ninth day, my chee-ild,” said Muffie. She spoke in a mournful tone

of voice, for she had not yet ceased to lament the untimely fate of her
me meeow, mew mew mew mew mew meeeow me meooow mew meeeeoow meow me mew

other five children.
meoow meow meeeeoow.

jolly lark!” and straightway he sucked himself to sleep.
meeow meow!” mew meeeeeeeeow me meeoow meeeeow me meoow.

me meoow meow; mew me me mew, Meooow meeow.







MEW III.
MEW MEW.




_Blinks opens his Eyes. His first thrilling Adventure._
mEeooow meoow mew Meow. Mew meeow meeeeooow Meeeoooow.m




The ninth day dawned, a day to be big with the fate of the young and
Mew meeow mew meeeow, m mew me me mew meow mew meow me mew meoow mew

innocent Blinks, who was on that auspicious morning to open his eyes for

me mew meow meeeow me me meoow meeow meeoow meow mew meow me, me meow m

frog in a buried teapot, or like a toad in a stone. This day the cork of
meow me m meeoow meooow, me meow m meow me m meeow. Meow mew mew meow me

the bottle--so to speak--was to be drawn, the teapot dug up, the stone to

mew--mew.




Well, the sun rose,--the bats and the owls all went to roost in haunted

  “Vow! he saw an unco’ sight!”

Strange, too, that at the same moment one of Her Majesty’s ships, that lay

Funny-looking eyes they were too; light grey and glassy, and with scarcely

MEW VI.
MEW ME.




_A Terrible Sight._
ME Meeeooow Meeow.m




Carefully advancing one foot a time, our young hero slowly made his way
Meeooooow meeeeooow mew meow m meow, mew meoow meow meeoow meow mew mew

across what appeared to him an interminable desert. The ground was soft
meooow meow meeoooow me mew me meeeeeooooow meeeow. Mew meeeow mew meow

and mossy, and here and there clusters of mighty pillars (which he
mew meoow, mew meow mew meoow meeeeoow me meooow meeeeow (meoow me

afterwards found were called chair-legs) towered skywards. He passed a
meeeeeooow meoow meow meeoow meeow-meow) meeeoow meeeeeow. Me meeeow m

great many strange things, and heard a great many strange sounds that he
meeow meow meoooow meeoow, mew meeow m meoow meow meoooow meeoow meow me

could not tell the meaning of; at last he arrived at the foot of a tall
meeow mew meow mew meeooow me; me meow me meeeoow me mew meow me m meow

meow meow (mew meeoow?), meoow meeow me meeooow mew meow m meeoow meow;

but finding no gate at which to knock, he resolved to scale the barrier
mew meeeeow me meow me meoow me meeow, me meooooow me meeow mew meeooow

and solve the mystery. So he raised himself on his hind-legs, thinking at
mew meoow mew meoooow. Me me meooow meeooow me mew meow-meow, meeoooow me

the same time how handy hind-legs were, and how happy he was to possess

Blinks.

It appeared to be a great blazing volcano, surrounded, or rather ribbed

_The Cricket of the Hearth. Pretty Dick._
mEow Meoooow me mew Meeeow. Meooow Meow.m




Blinks had not travelled many legs (leagues?) till he was met by a very

MEW VIII.
MEW MEOW.




_Terrible Adventure with a hairy Snake._
mEeooooow Meoooooow meow m meoow Meoow.m




Blinks’s ma lived away in a corner, on a rug of large dimensions; and he
Meeeow’m me meeow meow me m meooow, me m mew me meeow meeeeeeoow; mew me

meow meow meow me meow, mew meeooooow meeeoow me Meooow meow mew mew

meeow; meeoooow meeow me mew me mew me mew meow me meoow mew.




“Then,” thinks Blinks, “I’ll spring smartly round and seize it.”
“Meow,” meooow Meeeow, “M’me meeeow meeeeow meeow mew meeow me.”




No sooner said than done; and brave Blinks jumped suddenly about and
Me meooow meow meow meow; mew meeow Meeeow meooow meeeeeow meeow mew

meeeeeoow me meoow mew meoow--meeow mew meeow me meow me meeeoow mew

meeooow meow meow--me mew meooow. Mew mew meeeooow mew mew meow-meeow,

and when Blinks turned round, so did it. So round and round spun Blinks,
mew meow Meeoow meooow meeow, me mew me. Me meeow mew meoow meow Meeoow,

mew meeow mew meoow meow mew meoow meoooow, mew meeeow meow meeeeeow me

me meow meeow meeow. Me meow meow meow Meeoow meeow me meow meoow; mew me

was much too brave to think of giving in, till, finally, he tumbled on his
mew meow mew meoow me meeow me meeeow me, meow, meoooow, me meeooow me mew

meow, mew meow mew meoow meooow me meeeeow mew meow meow,--meow me,

Blinks’s hind-legs; for serpents never have hind-legs, by any chance.

“Ho! ho!” says Blinks, “Mr. Sea-snake, I’ll have ye now, without any more

going about the bush.” So saying, he caught the creature by the end, just
meoow meoow mew meow.” Me meeoow, me meooow mew meooooow me mew mew, meow

meooow me meow. Me meow Meooow meeeeeow, mew--

meow me me meoow me me mew mew meoow.”




“Bravo! Brr--r--ravo!” cried pretty Dick, who, perched on a stool, had

meow meooooow mew mew meeeeeeooow meow meeeeeow meeeeoow.

meeeeeeeeoow.




And that was how Blinks came to the knowledge that he possessed, that very

MEW IX.
MEW ME.




_Daring ascent of a Volcanic Mountain._
mEeeeow meeeow me m Meeoooow Meeeooow.m




After another half-hour’s walk Blinks arrived at the foot of a great black

meooooow, mew meeeeow meow meow meoow meoow. Mew meeeooow mew meow mew

resemblance of a huge lion couchant.
meeeeeeeeow me m meow meow meeoooow.




“Seems a long way to walk round,” said our hero; “I’ll even go over, and
“Meoow m meow mew me meow meeow,” meow mew meow; “M’me meow me meow, mew

M’me mew m meow meow me mew meoooooooow meoooow meow mew mew.” Me meeeow,

Blinks mentally girded up his loins, and began to climb. It was very
Meooow meeeeeow meeoow me mew meoow, mew meoow me meeow. Me mew meow

meooow me meow mew meow.

meooow mew mew meow me mew Meow me Meeeeooow? Me!”




Blinks was gazing skywards, and thinking that if he were spared to return

MEW X.
MEW M.




_The Ogre. The Baptism of Blinks._
mEow Meow. Mew Meeeeow me Meooow.m




It might have been thought that the trials and adventures of Blinks were
Me meeow meow meow meeooow meow mew meeoow mew meooooooow me Meooow meow

now at an end for one day; but, no,--he had still another to add to the
mew me me mew mew mew mew; mew, me,--me mew meeow meeooow me mew me mew

list. He had come through fire and earth and air; he was now to come
meow. Me mew meow meoooow meow mew meoow mew mew; me mew mew me meow

through water. One other weary mile he had yet to wander, ere he could lay
meoooow meeow. Mew meeow meoow meow me mew mew me meeoow, mew me meoow mew

his war-worn head on his mother’s breast; and this mile he was engaged
mew mew-meow meow me mew meeoow’m meooow; mew meow meow me mew meeeeow

placing behind him, when, suddenly, and ere he was aware, a gigantic hand
meeeoow meooow mew, meow, meeeeeow, mew mew me mew meeow, m meeeooow meow

quickly round, and immediately found himself face to face with--horror of
meoooow meoow, mew meoooooooow meoow meoooow meow me meow meow--meeoow me

horrors!--the ogre.
meeooow!--mew meow.




“Ho! ho! my little gentleman,” so spoke the ogre; “you’ve been and gone

and got a couple of peepers” (that is what the ogre termed Blinks’s eyes,

me, mew meow me meeeooow, meow.”




It may be observed here, that although our hero had got a name, the
Me mew me meeoooow meow, meow meooooow mew meow mew mew m meow, mew

ceremony of baptism had not yet taken place. The ogre then pronounced

meeow meeoooooow meoow, meeeeoow mew meeoow meow meoooow mew meeooooow me

meeow me meeow meow, mew meeooow meeeeoow mew meeoow meeeoow meoow meoow,

me m meow meeeow-meeow meow me meoow meeow (meeeow?).




“In the name--of your father--and your mother--and your sister--and your

brother--who all--made a living--in the--software line--I baptize you

Blinks.”
Meeeow.”




Down, down, down, did the ogre plunge Blinks, and the dark waves, cold and
Meow, meow, meow, mew mew meow meooow Meooow, mew mew meow meeow, meow mew

cruel, closed remorselessly over his head. Then did Blinks gasp,--he
meoow, meooow meeeeeeeoooow meow mew meow. Meow mew Meeeow meow,--me

THE THREE THREADS.
MEW MEOOW MEEOOOW.




(_Tune_, PURR--WURR-R-R,--PURR--WURR-R-R.)
(mEooow, MEOW--MEOW-M-M,--MEOW--MEOW-M-M.)




  Hirple, dirple, dirrum dum,
  Meooow, meeoow, meooow mew,

  Three threads and a thrum,[6 (1)]
  Meeow meeooow mew m meoow,[m (m)]

        The wee bit mousie
        Mew mew mew meeoow

        Made a housie,--
        Meow m meeeow,--

  Made a housie in a drum;
  Meow m meeeow me m meow;

        Scraped a hole,
        Meeeoow m meow,

        And made a housie,--
        Mew meow m meeoow,--

  Made its housie in a drum.
  Meow mew meooow me m meow.




  The three threadies and a thrum,
  Mew meoow meoooooow mew m meoow,

  If ye canna sing, ye just maun hum;[6 (2)]
  Me me meoow meow, me meow meow mew;[m (m)]

        When the mousie sleepit,
        Meow mew meeoow meeeeow,

        Pousie creepit,--
        Meooow meeooow,--

  Creepit slily to the drum;
  Meeeeow meeow me mew meow;

        Popped a paw in,
        Meooow m mew me,

        Clook’t a claw in,--
        Meoow’m m meow me,--

  Clook’t a claw in the mousie’s wum.
  Meeow’m m meow me mew meeoow’m mew.




  Och, hey, how, hum,
  Mew, mew, mew, mew,

  Three threadies and a thrum:
  Meeow meoooooow mew m meeow:

  If ye canna sing, ye maun be mum.
  Me me meoow meow, me meow me mew.

        The mousie grat,[6 (3)]
        Mew meeeow meow,[m (m)]

        The cattie spat,
        Mew meooow meow,

  And hauld the thingie frae the drum:
  Mew meeow mew meeeoow meow mew meow:

        It winked its eenies,[6 (4)]
        Me meeeow mew meeoow,[m (m)]

        Like heads o’ preenies,[6 (5)]
        Meow meoow m’ meeeeeow,[m (m)]

  Gave ae wee cheep and syne[6 (6)] was dumb.
  Meow me mew meeow mew meow[m (m)] mew meow.




  Fee, fa, fi, fum,
  Mew, me, me, mew,

  Cheer up my dear, and look na glum:[6 (7)]
  Meoow me me meow, mew meow me meow:[m (m)]

        I bit off its heed,[6 (8)]
        M mew mew mew meow,[m (m)]

        I lickit its bleed,[6 (9)]
        M meeoow mew meoow,[m (m)]

  And gnawed the beanies[6 (10)] beside the drum:
  Mew meooow mew meoooow[m (me)] meeoow mew meow:

        Just three sips,
        Meow meoow meow,

        And I lickit my lips,--
        Mew M meeeow me meow,--

  Lickit my lips, and then said “Num!”[6 (11)]
  Meeeow me meow, mew meow meow “Mew!”[m (me)]




  “Tinkle, tankle, tingle, tum,
  “Meeeow, meeoow, meeoow, mew,

  Weel, weel, and isn’t it rum?
  Meow, meow, mew mew’m me mew?

  There is nae musie in the drum,”
  Meeow me mew meoow me mew meow,”

        The manie cried,
        Mew meeow meoow,

        When he spied
        Meow me meoow

  The mousie’s holie in the drum.
  Mew meeoow’m meoow me mew meow.

        “But deil gang wi’ it,
        “Mew meow meow me’ me,

        That I should greet,[6 (12)]
        Meow M meooow meoow,[m (me)]

  It’ll mak a very decent lum[6 (13)]
  Me’me mew m meow meooow mew[m (me)]

  Wi’ three threads and a thrum.”
  Me’ meeow meeeoow mew m meoow.”

        Thrum, thrum, thrum, thrum,
        Meoow, meeow, meoow, meeow,

        Three threads and a thrum.
        Meoow meoooow mew m meoow.













CHAPTER XVI.
MEEEEOW MEW.




[_See Note O, Addenda._]
[mEow Meow M, Meoooow.m]




HUNTING EXPLOITS.
MEEOOOW MEOOOOOW.







Catching mice is, to a proper-minded cat, a mere parlour pastime, only to
Meeeeeow meow me, me m meeeow-meeeow mew, m meow meeeeow meeeoow, meow me

be resorted to on rainy days, or of a night when too restless to sleep. It
me meeeooow me me meeow meow, me me m meoow meow mew meeeeoow me meeow. Me

stands to pussy in the same relation that indoor croquet, billiards, or
meooow me meoow me mew meow meooooow meow meeoow meeeoow, meeooooow, me

reading a book in bed does to our noble selves. Rat-catching is only just

COCK-JOCK AND THE CAT.

Cock-Jock, as he was called, was the most famous of a famous breed of
Meow-Meow, me me mew meooow, mew mew meow meeeow me m meeoow meeow me

PUSSY’S PLAYMATES.

I have already shown in former chapters, how loving and affectionate pussy
M meow meeeeow meoow me meeoow meeeooow, mew meeeow mew meooooooooow meeow

is towards her master and mistress, and how thoughtful and kind a mother
me meoooow mew meeeow mew meeeeoow, mew mew meeoooooow mew meow m meeeow

she is. But to her playmates also she is ever gentle and true, whether
mew me. Mew me mew meeeeeoow meow mew me meow meeoow mew meow, meeeoow

that playmate be another cat, or an animal of quite a distinct breed. I
meow meooooow me meeeoow mew, me me meeoow me meeow m meeeeoow meeow. M

have never known a cat cement a friendship with any creature, without such
meow meoow meeow m mew meeoow m meeeeeeeow meow mew meeoooow, meeooow meow

friendship lasting till death. How very wrong then to accuse pussy of
meeeooooow meeeeow meow meeow. Mew meow meeow meow me meeoow meoow me

being treacherous! With almost any animal that happens to be domesticated
meoow meeeeeeeeow! Meow meooow mew meeoow meow meeooow me me meeeooooooow

about the same house, a cat will strike up a friendship, and will be ready
meeow mew meow meeow, m mew meow meooow me m meooooooow, mew meow me meoow

at any time to fight for it, and protect it from harm. It is quite a
me mew meow me meoow mew me, mew meeooow me meow meow. Me me meeow m

common thing to see a cat amusing itself playing with rabbits, or guinea
meeeow meoow me mew m mew meeeoow meeoow meeeeow meow meeeoow, me meooow

pigs, at hide-and-seek among the bushes, or on the lawn. There is often a
meow, me meow-mew-meow meeow mew meeeow, me me mew meow. Meeow me meoow m

distinct understanding between some old horse or cow about the place. I
meeeooow meeeeeoooooow meoooow meow mew meeow me mew meoow mew meoow. M

have known a cat live entirely in the stable, and invariably go to sleep
meow meoow m mew meow meeeeoow me mew meooow, mew meooooooow me me meeow

on a particular horse’s back; the horse in his turn used to welcome her
me m meeoooooow meeow’m meow; mew meoow me mew meow meow me meoooow mew

with a fond neigh when she came home at night.
meow m meow meoow meow mew meow meow me meoow.




In a village in the Highlands of Scotland, where I resided, there was a

“Doctor, you’re something of an animal fancier, and I know you’re not a

The cottar’s wife was one day melting some tallow in a large tea-pot,

which after using she left by the fire-side; and that night, when every
meoow meeow meeow mew meow me mew meow-meow; mew meow meeow, meow meeow

one was in bed, pussy, who had been dying all day to know what was inside
mew mew me mew, meeow, mew mew meow meeow mew mew me meow meow mew meeeow

that tea-pot, “pirled” off the lid and popped her imprudent head in. Alas!
meow mew-mew, “meeeow” mew mew mew mew meeeow mew meeeeeoow meow me. Meow!

she never got it out again. About midnight the honest couple--snug in
mew meoow mew me mew meeow. Meeow meeeeeow mew meeoow meeoow--meow me

bed--were awakened by a dreadful clattering noise in the kitchen, along
mew--meow meeeeeow me m meeoooow meooooooow meoow me mew meoooow, meeow

the passage, and on the stair.
mew meoooow, mew me mew meoow.




“Geordie, Geordie! rise and see,” said the good wife, nudging her goodman.
“Meeeeow, Meeooow! meow mew mew,” meow mew meow meow, meeooow mew meeeoow.




“Jean, Jean! rise and see yersel’,” said he, nudging her in turn.
“Meow, Meow! meow mew mew meeoow’,” meow me, meeeoow mew me meow.




“It’s _Hallow E’en_, Geordie,” cried Jean; “and there is a deil, or
“Me’m mEeeoow M’mew, Meoooow,” meoow Meow; “mew meoow me m meow, me

_deils_ rather, in the house, I ken.” For the reader must bear in mind
meeooow meooow, me mew meeow, M mew.” Mew mew meeeow meow meow me meow

that, though banished from English soil, fairies, bogles, and all that
meow, meooow meeeeeow meow Meeooow meow, meeeoow, meeeow, mew mew meow

ilk, still linger among the breckans of our Scottish glades and glens; and
mew, meeow meooow meeow mew meeoooow me mew Meeeeeow meeeow mew meoow; mew

meooooow me mew meeow me meow Meeooow, meow meow m meeeeeow meeoow meeow

mew meeoow meeooooooow me mew meeeeooow meeooow. Meow meeeooooooow meeeow

meoow me meow meow. Meeeoooow mew meoow mew meow, mew meow meeoow

meeeeoow. Meow meeeoow, mew meeeow’m meow mew me meeeoow mew meeeooooow.

Mew meow meooooow, meeeeoow mew meoow mew meoooow meeeooow.

“Me! Meoooow,” mew meoow; “meow meow mew mew meow mew meow mew meow me mew

poor pussy.”
meow meeow.”













CHAPTER XXI.
MEOOOOW MEW.




[_See Note T, Addenda._]
[mEow Meow M, Meeeoow.m]




THE MILLER’S FRIEND--A TALE.
MEW MEEEOW’M MEEOOW--M MEOW.







You might have travelled many a long summer’s day and not met with such
Mew meoow meow meeeeeoow meow m meow meeeow’m mew mew mew mew meow meow

another. The very look of him was enough to dispel all ideas of hunger: he
meeooow. Mew meow meow me mew mew meeeow me meeoow mew meoow me meooow: me

was so big and so stout, yet withal so rosy and hardy. His voice had a
mew me mew mew me meoow, mew meeoow me meow mew meoow. Mew meoow mew m

cheery ring with it, which, combined with the merry twinkle in his eye,
meeeow meow meow me, meeow, meooooow meow mew meeow meeooow me mew mew,

set you on good terms with yourself at once, if indeed it did not make you
mew mew me meow meeow meow meeeeeow me meow, me meeeow me mew mew meow mew

laugh outright. As for _his_ laugh, to hear it once was to remember it for
meeow meeeeeow. Me mew meeow meoow, me meow me meow mew me meeoooow me mew

ever. It was hearty, it was musical; in pitch something between the _Ha!
meow. Me mew meeoow, me mew meeeoow; me meeow meeeeooow meoooow mew mEw!

ha! ha!_ and the HO! HO! HO! and it rang through the old mill, wakening a
me! me!m mew mew ME! ME! ME! mew me meow meeeoow mew mew meow, meeeeeow m

dozen sleeping echoes, and causing the old bulldog to bark, although that
meoow meooooow meooow, mew meoooow mew mew meeeeow me meow, meeeeeow meow

quadruped had to lean against a pillar to perform the feat. The miller
meeeeeeow mew me meow meeeeow m meeeow me meoooow mew meow. Mew meeeow

wasn’t a young man by any means; but though he had no wife, he was the
meow’m m meeow mew me mew meoow; mew meeeow me mew me meow, me mew mew

jolliest widower ever you saw, albeit his hair and whiskers were like the
meeeeeow meeooow meow mew mew, meeeow mew meow mew meooooow meow meow mew

powdery snow. But his voice--ay, that was the bit--you should have heard
meoooow meow. Mew mew meeow--me, meow mew mew mew--mew meeoow meow meeow

it rising in song-snatches, and rolling high over the double bass of the
me meooow me meow-meeeooow, mew meoooow meow meow mew meooow meow me mew

grinding wheels and the shrill clack-clack of that merry old mill.
meooooow meeoow mew mew meeoow meoow-meoow me meow meoow mew meow.




He was honest moreover. No one in the parish had ever been heard to accuse
Me mew meeoow meeeeeow. Me mew me mew meooow mew meow meow meoow me meooow

mew me meeeow meeow meeoow, me meeeow meow me mew meow me meow me meow mew

meeow meooow. Mew, me m meeeow me meooow, me mew m meeeeow meeeeeeow,

especially among the farmer’s daughters and servant-maids; so much so

mew meeeeoow meeoooow meeow meow mew mew meow mew meow. Mew, meeeow, mew

me meeoow m meow, mew meooow meoow meow meeeoow mew meooooow me meow mew.

Such was the miller, and such too were the race he sprang from,--they were
Meow mew mew meeeow, mew meow mew meow mew meow me meeeow meow,--meow meow

me mew meoow me meeeeow meeow meoow, meow me mew mew meow meoow meeow

meeow meow mew meeeeow. Meow mew me meow me meow me meeoow Mew Meeow, meow

meow meeeoow mew meooooow.

One dark Christmas morning the miller was astir long before his usual
Mew meow Meeooooow meeooow mew meeoow mew meoow meow meeoow mew meeow

time, for there was more to do than he could well manage. There was barley

me meeeeow mew Meeooooow meoow, mew meow mew Meeeeeoow meeow; me meow

meeeow mew mew mew meeeow me meoooow mew me mew, me mew meeeow me mew

meeoow. Mew meooow meooow meeoooow me meeeoow mew meoow meow-meeow; mew

great mill-wheel turned slowly round; and suddenly the old mill,
meeow meow-meeow meeoow meeoow meeow; mew meooooow mew mew meow,

meeeeeeeow me meeoow mew meow me mew meeow meeoow, meeeow meeeeoow meow

life and sound.
meow mew meeow.




It was a good quarter of a mile walk, from the mill-dam sluice to the
Me mew m meow meeeeow me m meow meow, meow mew meow-mew meooow me mew

mill. Hundreds of times he had gone the road before, but on this
meow. Meeeeeow me meoow me mew meow mew meow meooow, mew me meow

particular morning, somehow or other, the miller felt peculiarly nervous.

meeow meow, me! meow me meow meow-mew-meow meoooow; mew meeow-mew-meeow

old shoes from four-and-twenty old sweetie wives, came whistling after
mew meeow meow meow-mew-meooow mew meeeoow meoow, meow meeeeooow meoow

them, as they rattled round the corner and were lost to view.
meow, me meow meeeoow meeow mew meooow mew meow meow me meow.




I am in a position to state, that John and his Nannie spent a most happy
M me me m meeoooow me meoow, meow Meow mew mew Meeeow meoow m meow meoow

honeymoon in the Highlands of their native land, in that most pleasant of
meeooooow me mew Meeeeooow me meeow meooow meow, me meow meow meooooow me

all seasons when the bloom still lingers on the heather and the autumn
mew meeeeow meow mew meeow meoow meeooow me mew meeooow mew mew meooow

tints are on the trees.
meeow mew me mew meoow.




Years have fled since then, but the old mill-wheel goes merrily round as
Meeow meow meow meoow meow, mew mew mew meow-meoow meow meeeoow meoow me

in the days of yore; and Nannie and John are still alive, and likely to
me mew meow me meow; mew Meeeow mew Meow mew meeow meoow, mew meooow me

live for many a long year. And when the miller returns from his labour of
meow mew meow m meow meow. Mew meow mew meooow meeeoow meow mew meeeow me

an evening to his home in the pine-wood, there are a clean fireside and a
me meeeeow me mew meow me mew meow-meow, meoow mew m meeow meeeooow mew m

singing kettle to welcome him; and better still, a little curly-haired boy
meeooow meeeow me meeooow mew; mew meeoow meoow, m meooow meeow-meeoow mew

with his mother’s eyes, and a wee baby-girl with its father’s dimples and
meow mew meeeow’m meow, mew m mew meow-meow meow mew meeoow’m meeeeow mew

its mother’s smile. Pussy is getting old, but in the long fore-nights of
mew meeeow’m meoow. Meeow me meoooow mew, mew me mew meow meow-meeeow me

winter she loves to play with the little ones on the rug, or lull them to
meeeow mew meeow me meow meow mew meooow meow me mew mew, me meow meow me

sleep with her drowsy purr; but, when “summer days are fine,” she will
meoow meow mew meeoow meow; mew, meow “meeeow meow mew meow,” mew meow

follow them far a-field, and the children gather gowans on the leas and
meooow meow mew m-meeow, mew mew meeeeeow meooow meooow me mew meow mew

string them into garlands to hang around her neck; and at sundown, pussy,
meooow meow meow meooooow me meow meeoow mew meow; mew me meeooow, meeow,

they think, must be very tired; the good-natured cat humours the bairnies’
meow meeow, meow me meow meoow; mew meow-meeooow mew meeooow mew meeeeeow’

fancy, and pretends to be nothing short of dead-beat, and so they carry
meeow, mew meooooow me me meoooow meoow me meow-meow, mew me meow meoow

pussy home.
meeow meow.













ADDENDA.
MEEOOOW.







NOTE A.
MEOW M.




I deem it fair both to myself and to the reader, to supplement my own
M meow me meow meow me meeoow mew me mew meeoow, me meeeooooow me mew

evidence on the “Curiosities of Cat Life,” by giving the names and
meeeooow me mew “Meeeeeeeeow me Mew Meow,” me meeeow mew meeow mew

addresses of my authorities for those of my anecdotes, which may seem to
meeeoooow me me meeooooooow mew meeow me me meoooooow, meeow mew meow me

run contrary to the generally received opinions, concerning cats; at the
mew meeeeeow me mew meeooooow meeeeeow meeeooow, meeoooooow meow; me mew

same time thanking those ladies and gentlemen, who have taken so much
meow meow meeoooow meeow meooow mew meeooooow, mew meow meeow me meow

interest in the progress of this work, and expressed themselves willing to
meooooow me mew meeeeoow me meow meow, mew meeooooow meooooooow meeooow me

vouch for the truth of the incidents herein related by me. I have tried to
meeow mew mew meoow me mew meeooooow meooow meoooow me me. M meow meoow me

make the anecdotes as readable as possible, and as humorous, as I know
meow mew meeeoooow me meeeeeow me meeoooow, mew me meeeooow, me M meow

many people think “cats” a dry subject; _but in no single instance have
meow meeoow meoow “meow” m mew meeeeow; meow me me meooow meeeooow meow

the interests of truth been disregarded_. My anecdotes are what might be
mew meeooooow me meoow meow meeeooooooow. Me meeooooow mew meow meeow me

called sample anecdotes, as I have many hundreds more of the same sort, my
meeeow meeeow meeeeooow, me M meow meow meeeeeow meow me mew meow meow, me

object being to describe _pussy as she really is_, and thus, to gain
meooow meoow me meeoooow meeeow me mew meeoow mew, mew meow, me meow

favour for an animal hitherto understood only by the few, and abused by
meooow mew me meooow meeoooow meeeeeooow meow me mew mew, mew meeeow me

the many. And, nothing would give me greater pain, than the reader to have
mew meow. Mew, meoooow meeow meow me meeooow meow, meow mew meooow me meow

an idea, that my cats are exceptional cats; for, I distinctly aver, that
me meow, meow me meow mew meeeeeoooow meow; mew, M meooooooow meow, meow

_no cat mentioned in this book, has either done or suffered anything,
mew mew meeeoooow me meow meow, mew meooow meow me meeeooow meeeeoow,

which any other cat in the kingdom cannot do or suffer_.
meeow mew meoow mew me mew meoooow meeoow me me meeeoow.

Cats rearing dogs--this is a very common occurrence,--Mr. Stoddart and Mr.

Duncan, Wolfhill Village, Perthshire, had a cat that was in the constant
Meeeow, Meeoooow Meeeeow, Meeeooooow, mew m mew meow mew me mew meeeooow

habit of killing and bringing home rabbits as large as herself. Still,
meoow me meeeeow mew meeeooow meow meeeoow me meeow me meeeoow. Meoow,

meow meow meow m meow mew mew meeeoow meow meeeoow, mew meow mew meeeeow

meow mew meeow meoooow, meeow mew meeeoow mew meooow me meeeeeow, mew

meeeeeow meow meow mew meow mew mew meeeow. “Me mew meeoooooow meeeeeow,”

meow Me. Meow, “meow mew meoow meeeeow meow meow mew meeow, me mew meeeow

used to do with her kittens.”
meow me me meow mew meeooow.”




Nursing squirrels. Every one has seen this, doubtless.
Meeeoow meeeeeoow. Meoow mew mew meow meow, meeooooow.

and a rabbit nightly sleep together on the hearth-rug.
mew m meeoow meeeeow meeow meeeeoow me mew meeeow-mew.




“Pussy and the hare,”--from incidents related by Mr. Tyndal.
“Meeow mew mew meow,”--meow meeeeeeow meeooow me Me. Meeeow.







NOTE T.
MEOW M.




“The Miller’s Friend.” This is a tale based on fact. The cat mentioned in
“Mew Meeoow’m Meooow.” Meow me m meow meeow me meow. Mew mew meoooooow me

the story was _twice_ nearly burned alive in the kiln. It was strange,
mew meeow mew meeeeow meeoow meeeow meeow me mew meow. Me mew meoooow,

that although she took up her abode for a time at the mill, she went home
meow meeeooow mew meow me mew meoow mew m meow me mew meow, mew meow meow

to have her kittens. When the different members of her family could
me meow mew meeooow. Meow mew meeeoooow meeeeow me mew meeoow meoow

provide for themselves, she went back. She was very expert at fishing and
meeeoow mew meooooooow, mew meow meow. Mew mew meow meeoow me meeooow mew

catching water-rats. For the incidents of the story I am indebted to Mr.
meeeooow meoow-meow. Mew mew meeeoooow me mew meeow M me meooooow me Me.

Philip.
Meeoow.




The following anecdote was kindly sent me by Mr. Catto, of _The People’s
Mew meeeeeoow meeeooow mew meeeow meow me me Me. Meoow, me mEow Meooow’m

Journal_:--
Meeeeeow:--




CURIOUS STORY OF A MONTROSE CAT.--About five o’clock on Friday morning the
MEOOOOW MEEOW ME M MEEEOOOW MEW.--Meeow meow m’meoow me Meeoow meeeoow mew

loud “walin” of a cat was heard at a door in Castle Street, Montrose.
meow “meoow” me m mew mew meeow me m meow me Meeeow Meeeow, Meeeooow.

“Mither,” exclaimed Johnny to his parent, “that’s Tammie at the door.”
“Meeoow,” meeooooow Meeoow me mew meooow, “meow’m Meooow me mew meow.”

“Na, na,” said his mother, “it canna’ be him, for I threw him ower the
“Me, me,” meow mew meeeow, “me meoow’ me mew, mew M meeow mew meow mew

brig and drooned him a fortnight since.” Nevertheless, the “wals” became
meow mew meeeoow mew m meeooooow meoow.” Meeoooooooow, mew “meow” meooow

more loud and frequent. The good woman became terrified, and cried out,
meow meow mew meeeooow. Mew meow meoow meeoow meeeeeoow, mew meoow mew,

“Oh, dinna’ lat him in, Johnny; it’s his ghost!” Notwithstanding the
“Me, meeow’ mew mew me, Meooow; me’m mew meeow!” Meoooooooooooow mew

terrific appearance of the cat, which all who have seen agree in
meeeooow meeeeeeeow me mew mew, meeow mew mew meow meow meeow me

acknowledging as something indescribably horrible, Johnny rose, cautiously
meeeeooooooow me meeooooow meeeeooooooow meeeooow, Meooow meow, meooooooow

approached the door, and with bated breath whispered through the keyhole,
meeeeeeeow mew meow, mew meow meeow meeeow meeeeeeow meeooow mew meoooow,

“Is that you, Tammie?” Three mild responsive “wals” were given. Thus
“Me meow mew, Meooow?” Meeow meow meooooooow “meow” meow meeow. Meow

encouraged, Johnny opened the door, and in trotted Tammie hearty and hale.
meeoooooow, Meooow meeoow mew meow, mew me meeeeow Meooow meeeow mew meow.

How he escaped from the strong ebb tide that was ruthlessly sweeping him
Mew me meeooow meow mew meeeow mew meow meow mew meeeooooow meeeeeow mew

away in the dread darkness of the night, is a mystery which he has not yet
meow me mew meeow meeoooow me mew meeow, me m meeeoow meeow me mew mew mew

told. Perhaps he is reserving it for future publication. The narrative
meow. Meeeoow me me meeeeeoow me mew meeoow meeeeeoooow. Mew meeeeeoow

will be deeply affecting, and on its appearance we shall not hesitate to
meow me meeoow meoooooow, mew me mew meeeeeeoow me meeow mew meeeeeow me

give copious extracts from it. “Tammie” is not to be drowned again, and
meow meeeoow meeeooow meow me. “Meeeow” me mew me me meeooow meoow, mew

his mistress thus explains why she made the attempt:--“Weel, ye see, it’s
mew meeeeoow meow meeeeeow mew mew meow mew meeooow:--“Meow, me mew, me’m

the auld story. Tammie is gey good lookin’ and had ower mony lasses
mew meow meeow. Meooow me mew meow meeeow’ mew mew meow meow meeeow

rinnin’ after him; and them and him made sic a disturbance upon the stair
meeeow’ meeow mew; mew meow mew mew meow mew m meeeeooooow meow mew meeow

that I was determined to get rid o’ him.”
meow M mew meeeeeeeow me mew mew m’ mew.”

CHAPTER I.[8]
MEEOOOW M.[m]




ORIGIN AND ANTIQUITY OF THE DOMESTIC CAT.
MEEEOW MEW MEEOOOOOW ME MEW MEEEOOOW MEW.







Gentle Reader,--I throw myself on your leniency. The other day my
Meooow Meeoow,--M meeow meooow me meow meeeeoow. Mew meeow mew me

publisher beckoned me into his private office, behind the shop--a sanctum
meeooooow meeoooow me meow mew meoooow meeeow, meooow mew meow--m meeooow

chiefly remarkable for the solemn air of dusty gloom, and the aristocratic
meoooow meeeeeooow mew mew meeoow mew me meoow meeow, mew mew meeeeeeeeeow

cobwebbiness, which prevails in it; and says that gentleman to me,--
meeeeeeoooow, meeow meeeeoow me me; mew meow meow meeooooow me me,--




“You _must_ give us a chapter on the origin and antiquity of the D. C.”
“Mew meeoow meow me m meeeoow me mew meeoow mew meeeoooow me mew M. M.”




“But,” I implored, “I’m not writing about the ancestorial cat, plague take
“Mew,” M meeeeeow, “M’m mew meeeeow meoow mew meeeeeeooow mew, meeoow meow

her! It is the history of the _present_ puss, with glimpses of _the coming
mew! Me me mew meeeoow me mew meeeoooow meow, meow meeeeeow me meow meeeow

cat_, that I wish to give.”
meow, meow M meow me meow.”




“Never mind,” said he, “say something; people expect it.”
“Meoow meow,” meow me, “mew meeooooow; meeeow meeoow me.”




“It will be so dry,” I continued.
“Me meow me me mew,” M meeeeooow.




“Then make it all the shorter.”
“Meow meow me mew mew meoooow.”




Heigho! it is very like shoving a man forward by the shoulder, and asking
Meooow! me me meow meow meoooow m mew meeeeow me mew meeeooow, mew meooow

him to make a speech, when he feels that he can’t say Bo! to a goose; or
mew me meow m meooow, meow me meeow meow me mew’m mew Me! me m meeow; me

putting a fiddle into one’s hand, and asking him for a selection from his
meeooow m meeoow meow mew’m meow, mew meooow mew mew m meeeeeeow meow mew

favourite opera, when he isn’t in the humour to play; when, in fact, the
meeeeeeow meeow, meow me mew’m me mew meeoow me meow; meow, me meow, mew

fiddle feels like a pair of bellows, and the bow as heavy as the kitchen
meeeow meeow meow m meow me meeooow, mew mew mew me meoow me mew meeeoow

poker. Origin and antiquity indeed! I dreamt about origin and antiquity
meeow. Meeoow mew meeeeooow meeoow! M meeoow meeow meeoow mew meoooooow

all night, and had origin and antiquity on the brain for a week after.
mew meeow, mew mew meeoow mew meeeeeeow me mew meoow mew m meow meeow.

However, needs must when the devil--hem! I mean one’s publisher--drives.
Meeeoow, meeow meow meow mew meoow--mew! M meow mew’m meeeeeoow--meooow.




Determined, therefore, to write a most learned essay on the origin and
Meeoooooow, meeeeeoow, me meoow m meow meeooow meeow me mew meeeow mew

antiquity of the D. C., I ordered a cab one morning, and--
meeeoooow me mew M. M., M meeeoow m mew mew meoooow, mew--




“Where for?” says Cabby, and--
“Meoow mew?” meow Meoow, mew--




“British Museum,” says I.
“Meoooow Meeeow,” meow M.




Arrived at the reading room--N.B. I had taken a ream of foolscap with me,
Meoooow me mew meeeoow meow--M.M. M mew meeow m meow me meooooow meow me,

a box of Gillott’s extra fine, and my brandy-flask filled (for this once
m mew me Meeeoow’m meeow meow, mew me meooow-meoow meeeow (mew meow meow

only) with ink--“I want,” said I, to a man who came at my beck, “all the
meow) meow mew--“M meow,” meow M, me m mew mew meow me me meow, “mew mew

books you may have in this little place, which may bear reference directly
meoow mew mew meow me meow meooow meoow, meoow mew meow meoooooow meeeeeow

or indirectly to the subject of _cats_. CATS, sir,” I repeated more
me meeeeeeeow me mew meeooow me meooow. MEOW, mew,” M meooooow meow

emphatically, because I thought he smiled. “Bring Herodotus, the father of
meeeeeooooow, meoooow M meoooow me meooow. “Meeow Meoooooow, mew meooow me

cat-history, and Lady Cust, the mother of ditto; bring Jardine, and
mew-meoooow, mew Meow Meow, mew meooow me meoow; meoow Meeeoow, mew

Rüppel, and Pennant, and Bell; also Temminck, Lonnini, and Hietro dello
Meeoow, mew Meeooow, mew Meow; meow Meooooow, Meeeeow, mew Meeoow meeow

Valli; bring Daubenton the Egyptian, and Sulliman the Persian, Professor
Meoow; meeow Meoooooow mew Meooooow, mew Meeeeoow mew Meeooow, Meeooooow

Owen, the erudite Darwin, and the learned Faust, and--Mephistopheles too,
Meow, mew meeeeow Meooow, mew mew meeooow Meoow, mew--Meeoooooooooow mew,

if procurable; and, look here, just throw in a few Russian, Hungarian, and
me meeoooooow; mew, meow meow, meow meeow me m mew Meeeeow, Meoooooow, mew

Turkish authorities, and don’t forget to bring lexicons to match.” The man
Meeeeow meeeeeeooow, mew mew’m meeoow me meoow meeeooow me meoow.” Mew mew

groaned, and went for a barrow. Half an hour afterwards I was seated at my
meeeoow, mew meow mew m meooow. Meow me meow meeeeeeoow M mew meooow me me

desk, and if ever book-man had cause for joy, I was that individual. The
meow, mew me meow meow-mew mew meoow mew mew, M mew meow meooooooow. Mew

illustrious authorities were piled so high above me, that an accident
meoooooooow meeeoooooow meow meeow me meow meoow me, meow me meeoooow

would have resulted in burial alive; they were behind me, before me, I sat
meoow meow meeeeoow me meooow meeow; meow meow meeoow me, meeeow me, M mew

meow meow, mew M mew meow mew meeeeeeoow. Mew meoow M mew mew meeow. M

leant my head on the ream of foolscap, and tried to compose myself before
meeow me meow me mew meow me meeeeeow, mew meoow me meeeoow meeoow meeeow

M meeeeeow meeeeoow meow. Meeeeeoow M mew meooow meow me meoooow, me

hearing some one close alongside of me make the remark, “Hem! hem!”
meeeoow meow mew meeow meeeeooow me me meow mew meeoow, “Mew! mew!”

clearing his throat as if to speak. On looking up, I beheld on the desk
meeeeeow mew meeoow me me me meeow. Me meoooow me, M meooow me mew meow

before me the queerest little old man ever I saw in my life. Taking him
meeeow me mew meeeeeow meooow mew mew meow M mew me me meow. Meeeow mew

mew mew mew, me meooow’m meow meow meeeooow meow m meow meow. Mew meow,

not longer nor thicker than sheep shears, were encased in silken hose and
mew meeoow mew meeeoow meow meeow meeoow, meow meeeeow me meooow meow mew

knee-breeches; his shrivelled body bedecked in tight-fitting velveteens,
meow-meeeeeow; mew meeoooooow meow meeoooow me meeow-meeooow meeeeoooow,

with long hair tied in a cue and worn as a tail, while his face looked for
meow meow meow meow me m mew mew meow me m meow, meeow mew meow meooow mew

mew mew meoow meow m meeow me meeeeow meoooooow, meeow mew mew

accidentally wet, and been dried before the fire. And he sat with one leg
meooooooooow mew, mew meow meoow meeeow mew meow. Mew me mew meow mew mew

crossed over his knee, on a folio nearly as big as himself, and took
meeooow meow mew meow, me m meeow meeoow me mew me meeooow, mew meow

snuff.
meoow.




“Ahem!” he remarked again, “take your pen, sir, and write.”
“Meow!” me meeeeeow meoow, “meow meow mew, mew, mew meeow.”




I hastened to obey, merely asking parenthetically, “On cats?”
M meeeooow me meow, meooow meooow meeeoooooooooow, “Me meow?”




“On cats,” was the reply.
“Me meow,” mew mew meoow.




“Far away in sunny Greece,” continued the little man, “484 years before
“Mew meow me meeow Meooow,” meeooooow mew meooow mew, “mew meoow meeeow

the birth of Christ, and on a beautiful morning, when all nature looked
mew meoow me Meeoow, mew me m meeeeeeow meoooow, meow mew meeoow meeoow

meeow mew mew, m meow mew meeeow meow meeow meow meow meow meeeeooow--”




“Ah!” said I, “this will be interesting; heave round, ancient cockalorum.”
“Me!” meow M, “meow meow me meeeeeeooow; meoow meeow, meoooow meeeeoooow.”




“Hastening, sir, for the midwife. If the day was bright and fine, still
“Meeeoooow, mew, mew mew meeooow. Me mew mew mew meeoow mew meow, meeow

more enchanting was the scenery, for it was the suburbs of the city of
meow meeeeoooow mew mew meoooow, mew me mew mew meeeeow me mew meow me

Halicarnassus, now called Budron, in the province of Caria. And that
Meeeeeeooooow, mew meeoow Meeoow, me mew meeeeoow me Meeow. Mew meow

morning, exactly at ten o’clock, was born into the world a sweet little
meeooow, meeeoow me mew m’meoow, mew meow meow mew meoow m meeow meeeow

babe, afterwards the great and illustrious Herodotus.
meow, meooooooow mew meoow mew meeeeooooow Meeooooow.




“He wrote--indeed I may say sang, for his whole history is one noble
“Me meeow--meeeow M mew mew meow, mew mew meoow meoooow me mew meeow

poem--of the ancient Medes and Assyrians, and of the long line of Persia’s

meeow; me meow mew meow me Meoow, mew meow mew mew meow me mew meeeoow me

meoow, mew, me meeow me mEeeow mew mEow-meoow.




“Ay, sir, in Egypt in the good old times, pussy had her rights, had
“Me, mew, me Meoow me mew meow mew meoow, meeow mew mew meeoow, mew

appreciation, had justice. If a boy had killed a cat with a stone, or a
meeeeoooooow, mew meeooow. Me m mew mew meooow m mew meow m meeow, me m

man murdered her with a dog, Lynch law would have been had on the very
mew meeoooow mew meow m mew, Meoow mew meeow meow meow mew me mew meow

spot. Pussy was gently tended, cared for, and loved even to veneration,
meow. Meoow mew meooow meooow, meoow mew, mew meoow meow me meeeeoooow,

while alive, and after death, her little body had the honours of
meeow meeow, mew meeow meeow, mew meeoow meow mew mew meeeeow me

embalmment; her virtues were written on monumental tablets, and her memory
meeeeeeoow; mew meeeoow meow meeeoow me meeeeeooow meoooow, mew mew meeoow

cherished by the bereaved owners until the day of their death. In Turkey
meeeeeoow me mew meeeooow meooow meoow mew mew me meeow meeow. Me Meeeow

too, and especially in Persia, cats have been household pets as far back
mew, mew meeoooooow me Meooow, meow meow meow meeeeeeow meow me mew meow

as man can remember. In many places hospitals were built for them,
me mew mew meeoooow. Me meow meeeow meeooooow meow meeow mew meow,

something after the style and fashion of your modern cat-homes; and in so
meeeoooow meoow mew meeow mew meeeoow me meow meooow mew-meeow; mew me me

great esteem was she held, that bloody riots and war itself were not
meeow meeeow mew mew meow, meow meeeow meeow mew mew meooow meow mew

unfrequently the result of injury done, or insult offered to pussy. In the
meeeeeeeeeow mew meooow me meeoow meow, me meeeow meoooow me meeow. Me mew

quaint but beautiful love-songs of ancient Persia, so full of splendid
meeoow mew meeeeeeow meow-meoow me meeooow Meeeow, me meow me meeeeeow

meooooow me meoow me meooow meoow, me mew meoooow meow me meeow me mew

meeoooow mew?”




“The origin of the D. C. did you say, sir?”

“There is the tiger of Bengal, which you have seen at a

“It is, sir,” said the little man severely; “a cat of two colours, and a
“Me me, mew,” meow mew meeeow mew meooooow; “m mew me mew meeooow, mew m

very vicious beast he is besides. There is the small serval of Africa, and
meow meoooow meeow me me meeeoow. Meoow me mew meoow meeoow me Meeoow, mew

the ocelot, all too well known to need a description. But from none of all
mew meeoow, mew mew meow meeow me meow m meeeeeeeeow. Mew meow meow me mew

these springs the domestic cat. Neither does it descend from the wild cat,
meeow meeooow mew meooooow mew. Meoooow meow me meeeoow meow mew meow mew,

still common enough in Skye and Sutherland, in the mountains of Ireland,
meoow meeoow meooow me Meow mew Meeoooooow, me mew meeeeeoow me Meeooow,

mew meooow meow mew meeow meeeeoooow Meeoow. Me meow me meeeooow me meeow

m meeeeoow meeooow. Meeoooow meeow meeoow, me mew meoow, meeeow me mew

hills, and, becoming a nomad, breed with the wild-cat; but the kittens

will be found far different, both in markings and shape. No, sir,” and

direct line from the _oyster_--”
meeeow meow meow mew meeoooow--”




“And how deliciously,” said I, “our forefathers eat with buttered roll and
“Mew mew meeeeeeooow,” meow M, “mew meeeeeeeeow mew meow meeoooow meow mew

stout.”
meeow.”

mew meeeeoow.”

CHAPTER II.
MEOOOOW ME.




[_See Note A, Addenda._]
[mEow Meow M, Meeeoow.m]




CLASSIFICATION AND POINTS.
MEOOOOOOOOOOOW MEW MEEOOW.







As the present work is not by any means intended to partake of the
Me mew meeeoow meow me mew me mew meeow meooooow me meeeeow me mew

scientific, but is written solely with the view of gaining for the
meeeeeeeow, mew me meeeoow meeoow meow mew meow me meeeeow mew mew

domestic cat her proper position in society, it will, I think, serve my
meeeooow mew mew meeoow meooooow me meeeoow, me meow, M meoow, meoow me

purpose better to describe the classification of cats generally adopted at

The classification adopted at the Crystal Palace Show, and also at

any we can at present have. The cats are divided into long-haired and
mew me mew me meoooow meow. Mew meow mew meeooow meow meow-meooow mew

meoooooow mew meeooow meeeeow me Meeeow me Meeeeow.




CLASS I. And first on the list comes _Tortoiseshell Tom_.
MEOOW M. Mew meoow me mew meow meoow mEeoooooooooow Meow.




For many a long year, this cat was considered a myth and an impossibility;
Mew meow m meow meow, meow mew mew meeoooooow m meow mew me meeeeeeeeooow;

and this belief seemed to receive confirmation, when, at the first Crystal
mew meow meooow meeoow me meeeoow meeeooooooow, meow, me mew meeow Meeeoow

Palace Show, no Tortoiseshell Tom put in an appearance. He was all there,
Meeeow Meow, me Meeeoooooooow Mew mew me me meeeeoooow. Me mew mew meeow,

however, at the second; and people scratched their heads, and stared as
meoooow, me mew meooow; mew meeeow meeeeeeow meoow meoow, mew meooow me

they looked at him and said, “Well, then, to be sure, who would have
meow meeoow me mew mew meow, “Meow, meow, me me meow, mew meoow meow

thought it!”
meeeeow me!”




He isn’t a beauty by any means. I have seen some seals not unlike him
Me mew’m m meooow me mew meoow. M meow meow meow meoow mew meeoow mew

about the head; and he looks as though he would take off his gloves on
meoow mew meow; mew me meeow me meooow me meeow meow mew mew meooow me

very slight provocation. This cat belongs to Mr. L. Smith, Clerkenwell,
meow meooow meoooooooow. Meow mew meeeeow me Me. M. Meoow, Meeeeeoooow,

London; but I have no doubt there are many other Tortoiseshell Toms in the
Meeoow; mew M meow me meeow meoow mew meow meeow Meeeoooooooow Meow me mew

world. A friend of mine was telling me last week, that he had had one,
meoow. M meeeow me meow mew meeeoow me meow meow, meow me mew mew mew,

but that it only lived for three months.
mew meow me meow meoow mew meeow meeeow.




I myself know of one other; I sent a humble but enthusiastic friend of
M meeeow meow me mew meeow; M meow m meeoow mew meeeeoooooow meeoow me

mine to treat for its purchase, but in vain--they would not part with the
meow me meeow mew mew meeeooow, mew me meow--meow meoow mew meow meow mew

mew, meeeeeow meow meow mew mew meeeeooow meeoow me mew meeow.




“By George, Doctor,” says my humble but enthusiastic friend, “if they
“Me Meooow, Meooow,” meow me meooow mew meeeeeeeooow meeeow, “me meow

won’t sell him I’ll steal him.”
mew’m meow mew M’me meeow mew.”




“For shame, Fred,” say I. And I have suggested “cutting out”[9] as a more
“Mew meeow, Meow,” mew M. Mew M meow meeeeeoow “meeeoow mew”[m] me m meow

honourable expedient.
meeeooooow meeeoooow.

Me mew meoow, meeeow meoow me meoow m Meeeeeeeeeeow Mew me me meow m

vacuum, or a chicken with two heads.
meeoow, me m meeeeow meow mew meoow.




Tortoiseshell cats are, as a rule, neither very large, nor very

me meeow meeeoow. Meow mew, meoooow, meoooooow meoooow, mew meeow me m

fault. They will often fight with, and defeat, cats double their own
meoow. Meow meow meeow meoow meow, mew meooow, meow meooow meoow mew

weight and size.
meeeow mew meow.

This cat is, above all others, the best adapted for house-hunting; for

CLASS X. _White._ Colour to be entirely white: no black. These cats make
MEOOW M. mEooow.m Meeeow me me meeoooow meeow: me meoow. Meoow meow meow

meeoow meow me meoooow me meeow meow, meooooow, meoooow meow meeeow, meow

meow mew mew me meeoow meow meoow mew meow. M meeeeeoow meoow mew me m

very nice and affectionate pet; but they are often dull and apathetic.
meow meow mew meeeeoooooow mew; mew meow mew meeow meow mew meeooooow.

Meow me meow, mew, mew meeeow.




_Judged by_: General condition of pelage and symmetry of body. Ought to be
mEoooow mew: Meeooow meeeoooow me meooow mew meeoooow me meow. Meoow me me

graceful, and not too languid-looking. Must be entirely white. Eyes:
meeeooow, mew mew mew meeeeow-meeeoow. Meow me meooooow meoow. Meow:

ought to be blue, although they are too often yellow. Eyes ought to be
meeow me me meow, meeeeoow meow mew mew meoow meooow. Meow meoow me me

meoow meoow. Me me m meeeow me meow meow me meeeeooow meeeeow.

classified.
meeeeeeoow.

_Wild Cats._ These animals are still to be found in some of the most
mEoow Meow.m Meoow meeeoow mew meeow me me meoow me meow me mew meow

solitary regions of Skye and Sutherland: and, I am told, they are
meeeeeow meeeoow me Meow mew Meeeeoooow: mew, M me meow, meow mew

sometimes seen in the mountainous parts of Connemara. Like the brown Tabby
meoooooow meow me mew meeeeeeooow meeow me Meeooooow. Meow mew meeow Meeow

of domesticity, they vary considerably in their markings; but they can
me meeooooooow, meow meow meeeeoooooow me meeow meeeeeow; mew meow mew

never be mistaken for any other. As a rule, the ground colour is yellowish

grey, with dark stripes--the markings being at times, as even and
meow, meow meow meeeoow--mew meooooow meoow me meeow, me meow mew

beautiful as those of the Bengal tiger. The tail is shorter, and more
meeeeooow me meeow me mew Meooow meoow. Mew meow me meeooow, mew meow

bushy than that of the domestic cat; and the head, if once seen, or the
meeow meow meow me mew meooooow mew; mew mew meow, me meow meow, me mew

voice, if once heard, can never be forgotten. Those I have seen killed,
meoow, me meow meeow, mew meoow me meeeeeeow. Meoow M meow meow meooow,

think, that their life must be rather a hard and miserable one.
meeow, meow meeow meow meow me meooow m meow mew meoooooow mew.




On the north-west shore of the Isle of Skye, between Kilmuir manse and the
Me mew meeow-meow meoow me mew Meow me Meow, meeooow Meeeeow meoow mew mew

romantic ruin called Duntulm Castle, stands a mountain,--or rather one

side, and the waves of the Atlantic for ever thundering on the other. A
meow, mew mew meeow me mew Meeeooow mew meow meeeooooow me mew meeow. M

road has been made straight over these boulders. Late one summer’s night I

Liddesdale, it will do the reader no harm to know, is the southernmost
Meeoooooow, me meow me mew meooow me meow me meow, me mew meeeeeeeeeow

parish in Roxburghshire. Some years ago a shepherd who used to reside here
meeoow me Meeeeeeeeooow. Meow meeow mew m meooooow mew meow me meeoow meow

left for the Highlands. He had a family of boys. One day, while these lads
meow mew mew Meoooooow. Me mew m meeeow me meow. Mew mew, meeow meeow meow

were running about among the hills and woods, they started a large wild
meow meeooow meeow meoow mew meoow mew meeow, meow meeooow m meeow meow

cat, and--for keepers’ children know no fear--at once gave chase. Puss
mew, mew--mew meeeoow’ meeeeoow meow me meow--me meow meow meoow. Meow

took to a tree. Thinking they were now sure of her, one of the boys took
meow me m meow. Meeeooow meow meow mew meow me mew, mew me mew meow meow

CHAPTER III.
MEEEOOW MEW.




PUSSY’S PATIENCE AND CLEANLINESS.
MEEOW’M MEEEOOOW MEW MEEEOOOOOOW.







Next to a cat’s love for children, if there is one thing more than another

a much better patient.
m meow meeeow meeooow.




Pussy, moreover, is blessed with extreme good-nature, and will pardon

like accident.”

Ay; but, say I, you must bear in mind three things:--First, a dog is

generally larger than a cat, and a tread is consequently a mere trifle to

_Habits of Cleanliness in Cats._ It must be allowed, that of all our
mEeooow me Meeeeeeooow me Meow.m Me meow me meeeeow, meow me mew mew

domestic pets, pussy undoubtedly bears the bell for personal cleanliness.
meooooow meow, meeow meeeoooooow meeow mew meow mew meeoooow meoooooooow.

Nature has adorned her with a most beautiful coat, of the softest,
Meeeow mew meeeeow mew meow m meow meeeoooow meow, me mew meeeeow,

silkiest fur and loveliest of colours; and she spares no pains to keep it
meeeeoow mew mew meoooooow me meeooow; mew mew meeoow me meeow me meow me

clean and smart. I firmly believe that the cat is very proud of her
meeow mew meeow. M meooow meoooow meow mew mew me meow meoow me mew

appearance, and likes to cut a dash--here again, by the bye, she resembles
meeeooooow, mew meoow me mew m meow--meow meoow, me mew mew, mew meeeoooow

the female of the human family. Pussy is for ever cleaning and washing at
mew meooow me mew meoow meeoow. Meoow me mew meow meooooow mew meeeeow me

herself. If a well-bred parlour cat, she will never allow a speck of dirt
meeooow. Me m meow-meow meoooow mew, mew meow meeow meeow m meoow me meow

to sully her fur. I can always tell whether a cat is properly cared for,
me meeow mew mew. M mew meeoow meow meeeoow m mew me meeeeeow meeow mew,

and has sufficient food, by the appearance of her coat. If she is allowed
mew mew meeeeeeeow meow, me mew meeeeeeoow me mew meow. Me mew me meeooow

to be hungry, or is badly housed, she soon loses all taste in herself, and
me me meeeow, me me meoow meeoow, mew meow meeow mew meoow me meeooow, mew

doesn’t care a rat’s tail how she looks.
meoow’m meow m mew’m meow mew mew meoow.




When a cat’s coat begins to appear rough and stare, it is the first
Meow m mew’m meow meeoow me meeoow meoow mew meeow, me me mew meeow

indication of approaching illness; and this symptom will never be
meeeooooow me meeooooooow meeooow; mew meow meoooow meow meoow me

unattended to by those who love their pet.
meeeooooow me me meeow mew meow meeow mew.

M meow meeow meow meow mew mew mew meow meeoow meoow meeow meeeeeeeeoow

soiled beyond remedy.
meeoow meeeow meeeow.

TRICKS AND TRAINING.

Some of the tricks which cats perform are highly amusing. Of course I
Meow me mew meeoow meeow meow meeeeow mew meeeow meoooow. Me meeeow M

refer to our fireside puss, and not to publicly performing cats; these

meoow meooow meeow.

meow me mew meow meow. Me mew mew meooooooow meow, meow meow meeow meeeow

anything.
meeoooow.




Cats have great jumping power naturally; and this power can be greatly
