mEeow M.m--Meeoooow me Mew. Meooow.




_Note W._--Related by Miss Oliver.
mEeow M.m--Meeeeow me Meow Meeeow.




_Note X._--Related by Mr. Swanson.
mEeow M.m--Meeooow me Me. Meeooow.







THE END.
MEW MEW.













FOOTNOTES:
MEEEOOOOW:




[1] The aversion of the poorer classes in Scotland to receive parochial
[m] Mew meeoooow me mew meooow meeeeow me Meooooow me meoooow meeeeeoow

relief, or to go into “the house,” is well known. No man having once done
meeoow, me me me meow “mew meeow,” me meow meoow. Me mew meooow meow meow

so can--or indeed would be permitted to--hold up his head among his
me mew--me meooow meeow me meeeeeeow me--meow me mew meow meeow mew

neighbours again.
meeeeoooow meoow.




[2] One only child.
[m] Mew meow meoow.




[3] Gowk--a cuckoo, an animal of little sense.
[m] Meow--m meooow, me meooow me meooow meoow.




[4] Tit--pap.
[m] Mew--mew.




[5] Dripping = kitchen-fee.
[m] Meeeeeow = meeeeow-mew.




[6] _Glossary to above._ 1, _Thrum_, a bit of thread. 2, _hum_, sing low
[m] mEoooooow me meeow.m m, mEeooow, m mew me meeoow. m, meoow, meow mew

without words. 3, _grat_, wept. 4, _eenies_, little eyes. 5, _preenies_,
meeeoow meoow. m, meeoow, meow. m, meooooow, meooow meow. m, meeeeeeoow,

small pins. 6, _syne_, then. 7, _glum_, melancholy. 8, _heed_, head. 9,
meeow meow. m, meeeow, meow. m, meooow, meooooooow. m, meeeow, meow. m,

_bleed_, blood. 10, _beanies_, small bones. 11, _Num!_ Nice! 12, _greet_,
meoooow, meeow. me, meoooooow, meeow meeow. me, mEow!m Meow! me, meeeeow,

weep. 13, _lum_, chimney-pot.
meow. me, meeow, meeeoow-mew.




[7] Women selling Scotch confectionery.
[m] Meoow meeooow Meeoow meeeeeeeeooow.




[8] Note. This chapter “is rote sarkastic.”
[m] Meow. Meow meeooow “me meow meeooooow.”




[9] See, page 100, vol. I.
[m] Mew, meow mew, mew. M.




[10] _Pelage_ in _cat_ology = feather in _dog_ology.
[me] mEeeeeow me meeeeoooow = meeeeow me meeeeoooow.




[11] Honey, suet, marlingspikes, and pens.--_Jack’s translation._
[me] Meeow, meow, meeooooooooow, mew meow.--mEoow’m meoooooooow.m




[12] In my next edition I shall insert a bird-stuffer’s name here. Space
[me] Me me meow meoooow M meeow meeeow m meow-meoooow’m meow meow. Meeow

to be let to the highest bidder.
me me mew me mew meeeeow meeeow.




[13] 11 o’clock.
[me] me m’meeow.




[14] Throughout the story, commander, captain, and skipper mean one and
[me] Meeeeeeoow mew meeow, meeooooow, meeeoow, mew meeooow meow mew mew

the same person. In the Royal Navy, a senior lieutenant generally commands
mew meow meeeow. Me mew Meeow Meow, m meooow meeeooooow meoooooow meeeeoow

a gunboat, and is called captain for courtesy, and skipper behind his
m meoooow, mew me meeoow meeooow mew meeeeeow, mew meoooow meeeow mew

back.
meow.

[me] Me! m Meeeeoow meeeeeeeeoow meow meeeeeeeeoow me mew Meoow Me!

(_Io!_)

“‘MEOW; MEOOW MEEEOW, MEEOW, MEW MEEEEOOOW,’ me Meeow Meow (mEeow & Meow)

is even more minute than ‘Stonehenge’ in the precise enumeration and
me meow meow meooow meow ‘Meooooooow’ me mew meeeoow meeeeeoooow mew

estimate of the points which rule the decision of the judges at the prize
meeeooow me mew meeeow meeow meow mew meeoooow me mew meeeow me mew meeow

exhibitions.”--_The Graphic, Nov. 23rd, 1872._
meeeeooooow.”--mEow Meeeoow, Mew. meow, meow.m




“The Editor has succeeded in doing what he professed to do, and that is
“Mew Meooow mew meeeeooow me meoow meow me meoooooow me me, mew meow me

meow meow meoow me meow meeow mew meow me meow meeooow.... Meeoow meow

that Mr. Webb has carried out his programme to the letter, what remains
meow Me. Meow mew meeeeow mew mew meeeoooow me mew meeeow, meow meeooow

for us here is the recommendation that admirers of the canine race should
mew me meow me mew meeeeeeeeeeeow meow meeeeoow me mew meeeow meow meeeow

purchase the book. They will not regret the trifling investment.”--_The
meeeooow mew meow. Meow meow mew meooow mew meeoooow meeoooooow.”--mEow

Sportsman, Nov. 23rd, 1872._
Meeooooow, Mew. meow, meow.m

meeow meow meeeooow.”--mEow Meoow, Mew. meow, meow.m

Section  2.  Information about the Mission of Project Gutenberg-tm
Meeooow  m.  Meeeeeoooow meoow mew Meeooow me Meeeeow Meeeeooow-me




Project Gutenberg-tm is synonymous with the free distribution of
Meeooow Meeeoooow-me me meeeeoooow meow mew meow meooooooooow me

electronic works in formats readable by the widest variety of computers
meeeeeeeow meoow me meeeoow meooooow me mew meeeow meeeeow me meeeeeeow

including obsolete, old, middle-aged and new computers.  It exists
meoooooow meeoooow, mew, meooow-meow mew mew meeeeeeow.  Me meeeow

because of the efforts of hundreds of volunteers and donations from
meeeeow me mew meeooow me meeeeoow me meeeeeooow mew meeeeeeow meow

people in all walks of life.
meeoow me mew meeow me meow.




Volunteers and financial support to provide volunteers with the
Meeoooooow mew meoooooow meoooow me meeeoow meeeeeeoow meow mew

assistance they need are critical to reaching Project Gutenberg-tm's
meeeeeeeow meow meow mew meeoooow me meeeeeow Meeeeow Meeeeeoow-me'm

goals and ensuring that the Project Gutenberg-tm collection will
meeow mew meooooow meow mew Meoooow Meeeeeoow-me meooooooow meow

remain freely available for generations to come.  In 2001, the Project
meooow meeoow meeeeooow mew meeeeeeeoow me meow.  Me meow, mew Meeooow

Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation was created to provide a secure
Meeeeeoow Meeeeoow Meeeoow Meeeeeeeow mew meeooow me meeooow m meeeow

and permanent future for Project Gutenberg-tm and future generations.
mew meoooooow meooow mew Meeeoow Meeeeooow-me mew meeeow meeeeeeooow.

To learn more about the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation
Me meoow meow meoow mew Meoooow Meoooooow Meeeooow Meeeeow Meooooooow

and how your efforts and donations can help, see Sections 3 and 4
mew mew meow meeeeow mew meeooooow mew meow, mew Meooooow m mew m

and the Foundation information page at www.gutenberg.org
mew mew Meeoooooow meeeeooooow meow me mew.meeeeeoow.mew

Meeooow Meeeoow.  Mew Meeeeoooow'm MEW me meeeeow mew meeeeeooooooow

number is 64-6221541.  Contributions to the Project Gutenberg
meeoow me me-meeeeow.  Meeeeeoooooow me mew Meoooow Meeeeeeow

Literary Archive Foundation are tax deductible to the full extent
Meeeeeow Meeeoow Meeoooooow mew mew meeeeeeoow me mew meow meeeow

permitted by U.S. federal laws and your state's laws.
meeeoooow me M.M. meeooow meow mew meow meoow'm meow.

Section 4.  Information about Donations to the Project Gutenberg
Meeeeow m.  Meeooooooow meeow Meeooooow me mew Meeeoow Meeeoooow

Literary Archive Foundation
Meooooow Meeooow Meeeeoooow




Project Gutenberg-tm depends upon and cannot survive without wide
Meoooow Meoooooow-me meeeoow meow mew meeeow meeeoow meoooow meow

spread public support and donations to carry out its mission of
meeoow meeoow meeooow mew meeeeooow me meeow mew mew meeeeow me

increasing the number of public domain and licensed works that can be
meeoooooow mew meooow me meeeow meeeow mew meeoooow meeow meow mew me

freely distributed in machine readable form accessible by the widest
meooow meeeeeoooow me meeeoow meooooow meow meeeeeeoow me mew meeoow

array of equipment including outdated equipment.  Many small donations
meoow me meoooooow meeeeooow meeeooow meoooooow.  Meow meeow meoooooow

($1 to $5,000) are particularly important to maintaining tax exempt
($m me $m,mew) mew meeeeeooooow meeeeeeow me meeeeeeeoow mew meeoow

status with the IRS.
meooow meow mew MEW.




The Foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating
Mew Meeeeeeoow me meeeoooow me meeeeeoow meow mew meow meeeeeooow

charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United
meeooooow mew meeeooooow meoooooow me mew me meooow me mew Meeoow

States.  Compliance requirements are not uniform and it takes a
Meeeow.  Meeoooooow meeeeeeeeoow mew mew meoooow mew me meeow m

considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up
meeeeeeeeeow meeoow, meow meeeeeeow mew meow meow me meow mew meow me

with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations
meow meeow meeoooooooow.  Me me mew meoooow meeeeooow me meeeeeoow

where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To
meeow me meow mew meeoooow meeeoow meeeeeooooow me meeoooooow.  Me

SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any
MEOW MEEOOOOOW me meeeeeeow mew meooow me meeeeeeoow mew mew

particular state visit www.gutenberg.org/donate
meeeeeeeow meoow meeow mew.meeeoooow.mew/meooow




While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we
Meeow me meooow mew me mew meoooow meeooooooooow meow meeoow meoow me

have not met the solicitation requirements, we know of no prohibition
meow mew mew mew meeoooooooow meeeeeeeeoow, me meow me me meeeeeoooow

against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in such states who
meeooow meeooooow meeeeeoooow meeeoooow meow meooow me meow meooow mew

approach us with offers to donate.
meeeeoow me meow meeoow me meooow.




International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make
Meoooooooooow meeooooow mew meeoooooow meooooow, mew me meeeow meow

any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from
mew meeeeeeeow meeeeeeoow mew meoooooow me meeeoooow meeeooow meow

outside the United States.  U.S. laws alone swamp our small staff.
meeooow mew Meeeow Meeoow.  M.M. meow meoow meeow mew meeow meoow.




Please check the Project Gutenberg Web pages for current donation
Meeeow meoow mew Meoooow Meeeeeoow Mew meoow mew meoooow meooooow

methods and addresses.  Donations are accepted in a number of other
meeeoow mew meeeeooow.  Meeeoooow mew meeeeeow me m meeeow me meeow

ways including checks, online payments and credit card donations.
meow meoooooow meeoow, meooow meeoooow mew meeeow meow meeeeeoow.

To donate, please visit:  www.gutenberg.org/donate
Me meeeow, meooow meeow:  mew.meeooooow.mew/meeoow







Section 5.  General Information About Project Gutenberg-tm electronic
Meeooow m.  Meeooow Meeeoooooow Meeow Meoooow Meeeeooow-me meooooooow

works.
meoow.




Professor Michael S. Hart was the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm
Meoooooow Meoooow M. Meow mew mew meeeeeooow me mew Meeeeow Meoooooow-me

concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared
meeeoow me m meeeeow me meooooooow meeow meow meeow me meeoow meeeow

with anyone.  For forty years, he produced and distributed Project
meow meooow.  Mew meeow meeow, me meeeooow mew meoooooooow Meoooow

Gutenberg-tm eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support.
Meeeoooow-me mEeoow meow meow m meeow meeeoow me meeeeeeow meeooow.




Project Gutenberg-tm eBooks are often created from several printed
Meoooow Meeeoooow-me mEeoow mew meoow meeooow meow meeeeow meoooow

editions, all of which are confirmed as Public Domain in the U.S.
meeeeoow, mew me meoow mew meoooooow me Meooow Meeoow me mew M.M.

unless a copyright notice is included.  Thus, we do not necessarily
meooow m meeooooow meeoow me meeeeoow.  Meow, me me mew meeeeeeeeow

keep eBooks in compliance with any particular paper edition.
meow mEeeow me meeoooooow meow mew meooooooow meeow meeooow.




Most people start at our Web site which has the main PG search facility:
Meow meeoow meoow me mew Mew meow meeow mew mew meow ME meeoow meooooow:




     www.gutenberg.org
     mew.meeeeooow.mew




This Web site includes information about Project Gutenberg-tm,
Meow Mew meow meooooow meoooooooow meoow Meeeeow Meoooooow-me,

including how to make donations to the Project Gutenberg Literary
meeeeeeow mew me meow meeooooow me mew Meeeeow Meeeeeoow Meeoooow

Archive Foundation, how to help produce our new eBooks, and how to
Meeooow Meeeeoooow, mew me meow meeeeow mew mew mEeoow, mew mew me

subscribe to our email newsletter to hear about new eBooks.
meeeeeeow me mew meeow meeoooooow me meow meeow mew mEooow.
